Upload CSV File

Upload a CSV file from Azure Migrate Dependency analysis to start visualization.

You can add following columns to the CSV file to help grouping resources:

  • Source VLAN
  • Destination VLAN
Be sure to use the exact column names as mentioned above.

Data Privacy Notice: The data you upload is processed on our server solely for the purpose of analysis. We do not store or log any of the uploaded data. Once the analysis is complete, the results are displayed on the web page and managed by your browser for visualization.

The ownership of the data remains with you, the user. The tool owner does not assume any responsibility for the data.

It is recommended to run the tool in a self-hosted environment for sensitive data.
